content:
: A hairstyle that adds volume to the top of the head can help to balance out a flat nose. Glasses with frames that sit high on the nose can help to draw attention away from a flat nose. A well-groomed mustache or a goatee can complement a flat nose.

6. For a pointed chin: A hairstyle that adds volume to the top of the head can help to balance out a pointed chin. Glasses with frames that sit high on the nose can help to draw attention away from a pointed chin. A well-groomed mustache or a goatee can complement a pointed chin.
7. For a square chin: A hairstyle that adds volume to the top of the head can help to balance out a square chin. Glasses with frames that sit high on the nose can help to draw attention away from a square chin. A well-groomed mustache or a goatee can complement a square chin.
8. For a round chin: A hairstyle that adds volume to the top of the head can help to balance out a round chin. Glasses with frames that sit high on the nose can help to draw attention away from a round chin. A well-groomed mustache or a goatee can complement a round chin.
9. For a recessed chin: A hairstyle that adds volume to the top of the head can help to balance out a recessed chin. Glasses with frames that sit high on the nose can help to draw attention away from a recessed chin. A well-groomed mustache or a goatee can complement a recessed chin.
